00401 template<class function>
00402         void C4DView::FunctionSlot<function>::createFunction(C4DView *view) {
00403 
00404         view->F.reset(new function (
00405             view->Values->tmin (), view->Values->tmax (), view->Values->dt (),
00406             view->Values->umin (), view->Values->umax (), view->Values->du (),
00407             view->Values->vmin (), view->Values->vmax (), view->Values->dv ()));
00408 
00409     SingletonLog::Instance() << "FunctionSlot<function>::createFunction(): "
00410             << view->F->getFunctionName().toStdString()
00411             << "(" << view->F->getParameterName(0).toStdString()
00412             << "," <<view->F->getParameterName(1).toStdString() <<","
00413             << view->F->getParameterName(2).toStdString() <<","
00414             << view->F->getParameterName(3).toStdString()<<")\n";
00415 
00416     view->menu->updateFunctionMenu (view->F->getFunctionName());
00417     view->AssignValues (view->F);
00418     view->Redraw ();
00419 }
00420 
00422 
00426 template<class function>
00427         void C4DView::FunctionSlot<function>::createSurface(C4DView *view) {
00428 
00429     view->F.reset(new function (
00430              view->Values->tmin (), view->Values->tmax (), view->Values->dt (),
00431              view->Values->umin (), view->Values->umax (), view->Values->du ()));
00432 
00433     try {
00434         view->menu->updateFunctionMenu (view->F->getFunctionName());
00435     } catch (QString error) {
00436         QMessageBox::information (NULL, "Error", error);
00437 
00438     }
00439     view->AssignValues (view->F);
00440 
00441     view->Redraw ();
00442 }

00457 template<class function>
00458         void C4DView::CustomFunctionSlot<function>::createCustomFunction(
00459                  C4DView *view) {
00460             function *tmp = new function (
00461                 view->Values->tmin (), view->Values->tmax (), view->Values->dt (),
00462                 view->Values->umin (), view->Values->umax (), view->Values->du (),
00463                 view->Values->vmin (), view->Values->vmax (), view->Values->dv ());
00464             if (tmp->isValid()) {
00465                     view->F.reset(tmp);
00466                     QString sym (((function *)(view->F).get ())->symbolic());
00467 
00468                 view->AssignValues(view->F);
00469                 view->Redraw ();
00470             } else {
00471                 delete tmp;
00472                 view->UpdateStatus("Failed to load custom function");
00473             }
00474         }
00475 
00477 
00482 template<class function>
00483         void C4DView::CustomFunctionSlot<function>::createCustomSurface(
00484                 C4DView *view) {
00485             function *tmp = new function (
00486                 view->Values->tmin (), view->Values->tmax (), view->Values->dt (),
00487                 view->Values->umin (), view->Values->umax (), view->Values->du ());
00488             if (tmp->isValid()) {
00489                 view->F.reset(tmp);
00490                 QString sym (((function *)(view->F).get ())->symbolic());
00491 
00492                 view->AssignValues(view->F);
00493                 view->Redraw ();
00494             } else {
00495                 delete tmp;
00496                 view->UpdateStatus("Failed to load custom function");
00497             }
00498         }
